other_title: Chō-Bakuretsu I-Jigen Menko Battle Gigant Shooter Tsukasa (Japanese)
超爆裂異次元メンコバトル ギガントシューター つかさ (Japanese)
plot: Tsukasa Mendō, a gamer who dreams to become the best at Gigant Shooter (battles in a game similar to pog) in the world. The menko card his father left for him called "King Menger" is his partner. Tsukasa's fellow gamers are the cute but tsundere Miruko Koide, the spectacled bully Manabu Numata, and the realist and sharp-tongued Ataru Dōmoto.
opening_theme: "Gigant Shooter Dacchū no!" by Psychic Lover
ending_theme: "Kimi ga Ichiban Tsutaetai Mono" by Gigant Girls
